title: Food from the reluctant earth
creator_credit: Edwin Scragg, Lesley Hammond and South Australian Film Corporation
brief_description: Examines the cereal belt area of South Australia, where farmers must grow crops without irrigation and maintain livestock with a minimum of water. Explains the wheat/legume rotation system that enables farmers to obtain high yields.
